summary: Quick-tempered yet likable Biff Grimes falls for the beautiful Virginia Brush, but he is not the only young man in the neighborhood who is smitten with her.
cast: James Cagney|Olivia de Havilland|Rita Hayworth|Alan Hale|Jack Carson|George Tobias|Una O'Connor|George Reeves|Lucile Fairbanks|Edward McNamara|Helen Lynd|Herbert Heywood|Herbert Anderson|Peter Ashley|Paul Barrett|Wade Boteler|George Campeau|Lucia Carroll|Margaret Carthew|Eddy Chandler|Richard Clayton|Jack Daley|Peggy Diggins|Abe Dinovitch|Maude Eburne|Ann Edmonds|Pat Flaherty|James Flavin|Nora Gale|Roy Gordon|Harrison Greene|Creighton Hale|Carl Harbaugh|Russell Hicks|Max Hoffman Jr.|George Humbert|Frank Mayo|Frank Melton|Jack Mower|William Newell|Frank Orth|Bob Perry|Susan Peters|Paul Phillips|June Preston|Addison Richards|Tim Ryan|Harry Seymour|John Sheehan|David Thursby|Dorothy Vaughan|Ben Welden|Dick Wessel
title: La pelirroja
